conftest module¶

Global test configuration.

class conftest.Context[source]¶

Bases: object

Holds global test configuration parameters & test environment hooks.

config and status are created during object initialization, and are populated by the different tests. pf and cl are created during test initialization, as part of the test_init_and_upgrade_SUT script.

  • env - Box object from qed_env.yml.
  • status - Box with test status details. Example, flags for PF & PFE clean upgrades.
  • config - Box holding data for driving different test cases, as generated by the different test scripts.
  • pf - PathFinder class instance for PathFinder system under test.
    • pf.spec - Swagger spec retrieved from PathFinder SUT, possibly patched.
    • pf.cl - Swagger client instance, to make PathFinder RESTful calls.
  • cl - shorthand link to pf.cl.
  • PF - common access to PathFinder() module/fixture.
  • PFE - common access to PathFinderEdge() module/fixture.
teardown()[source]¶

Test tear-down.

conftest.context(request, pf, pfe)[source]¶

Common fixture to access system under test & test environment (test context).

conftest.pf(request)[source]¶

PathFinder as a fixture.

conftest.pfe(request)[source]¶

Provide should BDD keyword as a fixture.
